free_text.Learning outcomes: The aim of this course is to expose students to important papers in the literature on corporate finance. Some important topics, such as corporate governance, are omitted. This is partly a function of my tastes and partly due to my sense of which fields are already crowded. The objective of the course is to give you a working understanding of key papers and to expose students to solution techniques to be applied in their own research.[br/]
free_text.Required prior knowledge: Stochastic calculus; Asset pricing theory; Contract and game theory[br/]

free_text.Pr√©requis: Stochastic calculus; Asset pricing theory; Contract and game theory[br/]
